column4: ok...  so  i just downloaded the Skype installer from medibuntu and there is an error: Wrong architecture "i386'
entiendo espanol, pero no muy bien...
anyone know something I can do to fix the problem?
whats wrong with it? you should just be able to apt-get install it
i don't have the medibuntu repos on here. i just did apt-get install
yes, thats all ya gotta do
thats how you install packages with ubuntu. sudo apt-get install <package>
yup. =) any kde app works in gnome, and any gnome app works in kde
i would say to google "ubuntu keyboard shortcuts" cause there are WAY more than listed, like alt f2 for a run box
